main event: A strange creature and airborne object were observed by a number of persons in Flatwoods, West Virginia on September 12, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 20 minutes,The object had a size comparable to a basketball but appeared larger due to its position near the horizon,The sighting involved a brilliant greenish white egg-shaped object moving at computed velocities between 2,600 mph and 13,000 mph,The duration of the flight as observed was about 7-8 seconds,The sighting has no photographic evidence associated with it.
sighted object: a brilliant greenish white egg-shaped object
